data.name: Cloud Escape
data.detailed_description:
What started as a simple game jam project transformed into a full-fledged video game. Cloud Escape is a stylized 3D precision platformer where every mistake will be punished. The game world features different themed areas, each of which offers unique scenery, mechanics, obstacles and traps. Are you destined to escape the clouds?

2 Game Modes
The goal is the same in both game modes: reach the end as fast as possible! In Normal Mode, you can simply focus on reaching the end. In Hard Mode, on the other hand, the gate in front of the end is locked. Collect all coins to unlock the gate and then reach the end.

For Dedicated Players
You love the challenge and want to put your skills to the test? Countless traps and obstacles await you in the different areas. The world of Cloud Escape offers platforming, moving platforms, physics puzzles, projectiles, flamethrowers, blades, saws, spectral phenomena, bumpers and much more.

For Speedrunners
For all players who like to constantly improve their best time: Cloud Escape was also developed for speedrunners. In addition to a death counter, the game also has a very precise timer. Run by run, you optimize your routes and discover new possibilities to further optimize your personal best time.

Unlock More Characters
Master difficult challenges to unlock more characters. Be ready, hardcore players! Because the elite characters are especially hard to unlock!

Unlock Steam achievements
The game is packed with fun and challenging Steam achievements. Can you collect them all?

data.short_description: A stylized 3D precision platformer where every mistake will be punished. Are you destined to escape the clouds?
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i5-2550K, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon R9 290X or Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

highlighted.name: Life Finds A Way... To Die
